feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improved query efficiency in the Client Portal
  • PayPal Advanced credit cards
  • Add Nordigen filters
  • Add Nordigen account id to transformer
  • Fixes for line breaks in email text body
  • Fixes for rounding tasks down
  • Fixes for Expense excport preview props
  • Rerun Timezone migrations
  • Add twig linter
  • BTCPay updates
  • Add current company route
  • Migrate statics into singletons (instead of cache)
  • v5.9.6 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9640

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.5...v5.9.6

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update intended path when redirecting to CP. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9642
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9646
  • Static Analysis + Cache refactor by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9648
  • v5.9.7 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.6...v5.9.7

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Stripe network updates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9653
  • Feature: E-Invoice Import by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9635
  • Upgrade to Laravel 11 by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9569
  • Referral Meta by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9664
  • Update for Laravel 11 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9665

  • v5.10.0 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9674

  • Upgrades framework to Laravel 11.

  • Remove dual release files
  • Fixes for gateway fees
  • Move statics into singletons
  • Task rate validation
  • Stripe network updates
  • Scoping for nordigen bank refresh
  • Add search filters for recurring invoices
  • Fixes for generated numbers where the recurring prefix was being omitted.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.9...v5.10.0
